name: rgex
description: A powerful, chainable regex builder platform with comprehensive validation utilities

scripts.build:js: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --splitting --format esm
scripts.build:js:min: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --minify --splitting --format esm
scripts.build: bun run build:js && bun run build:types
scripts.build:min: bun run build:js:min && bun run build:types
scripts.build:ci: bun install && bun run build && bun test
scripts.docs: bun run build:docs && echo 'Markdown documentation generated in docs/'
scripts.docs:preview: bun run build:docs && echo 'Documentation built! Check docs/README.md'
scripts.pages:build: bun run build:docs && echo 'GitHub Pages build complete'

author: duongnguyen321
